CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: I ds = ( W / 2L ) × μ × C i ( V gs - V th ) The OFET device using as-cast PCDTBT films without thermal annealing exhibits a hole mobility of 2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s with an on / off current ratio ( I on / I off ) of 4.44 × 10^3 .

Let's think step by step.

1. In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are:
* PCDTBT - It is an organic semiconductor material used in the OFET device.

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph are:

* I ds - Symbol representing the drain-source current in the OFET device.
* W - Width of the semiconductor channel in the OFET device.
* L - Length of the semiconductor channel in the OFET device.
* μ - Mobility of the charge carriers in the semiconductor channel.
* C i - Capacitance per unit area of the gate dielectric.
* V gs - Voltage applied between the gate and source electrodes.
* V th - Threshold voltage of the OFET device.
* I on / I off - Ratio of the drain-source current in the ON and OFF states of the OFET device.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: I ds = ( W / 2L ) × μ × C i ( V gs - V th ) The OFET device using as-cast PCDTBT films without thermal annealing exhibits a hole mobility of 2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s with an on / off current ratio ( I on / I off ) of 4.44 × 10^3 .

Let's think step by step.

1. "hole mobility" is a Property Name
2. "on / off current ratio" is a Property Name

These are the two "Property Name" entities found in the paragraph. They refer to specific characteristics or properties of the OFET device being described.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. "hole mobility" is a Material Property
2. "on / off current ratio" is a Material Property

These are the two entities that clearly refer to Material Properties in the paragraph. They describe specific characteristics or attributes of the material being used in the OFET device.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole mobility |
| on / off current ratio |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: I ds = ( W / 2L ) × μ × C i ( V gs - V th ) The OFET device using as-cast PCDTBT films without thermal annealing exhibits a hole mobility of 2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s with an on / off current ratio ( I on / I off ) of 4.44 × 10^3 .

Let's think step by step.

1. "A hole mobility of 2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s" contains the "Property Value" entity of "2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s" representing the hole mobility of the OFET device.
2. "An on / off current ratio ( I on / I off ) of 4.44 × 10^3" contains the "Property Value" entity of "4.44 × 10^3" representing the on/off current ratio of the OFET device.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "2.2 × 10^-4 cm^2 / V°s" (representing the hole mobility of the OFET device)
2. "4.44 × 10^3" (representing the on/off current ratio of the OFET device)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
